question: Which state government launched 'Khushi', a scheme that offers free sanitary pads to 17 lakh girl students in the state?
explanation: Odisha government launched 'Khushi', a scheme that offers free sanitary pads to 17 lakh girl students in Odisha. Odisha Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik launched the scheme 'Khushi'. This will offer free sanitary pads for girl students from Class 6 to 12 studying in all government and government-aided schools of Odisha. He said that, this scheme will help in improving health and hygiene of adolescent girls and in higher retention of girl students in school.
